statements: DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 500 AND amount > 1000;

DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE

DELETE FROM unauthorized_transactions WHERE unauthorized_user_id = 50 AND transaction_amount > 1000;
